title: Vaccine Locator
cleaned_text: This is an interactive map that will help you locate a vaccinating pharmacy or clinic in your neighborhood. Please contact the pharmacy or clinic to confirm availability of vaccine and restrictions that may apply. To get started, click [here](https://histategis.maps.arcgis.com/apps/MapSeries/index.html?appid=ad80728fb9884784973e911ed58b939f) or on the image below. Step 1: Click on a vaccine tab at the top of the page (e.g. Flu, Hep A, Hep B, etc.) Step 2: Zoom in to your neighborhood Step 3: Select a star to view the pharmacy or clinic's name, address, phone number, hours of availability, and restrictions that may apply The following vaccines are searchable in April 2019
